metadata.name: Fumiko - Beastie #01
metadata.description:
Name: Fumiko
Animal: Mouse
Special trait: hypnosis

“Squeak ~ such a loser, can’t even follow up my bet ~” 
Are you ready to truly “play” with Fumiko?

Mischievous and playful, Fumiko possesses an otherworldly and wild personality. Never afraid to take risks, a true degenerate behind the cutesy outlook (hence the ring)!

She entices people with her sypnosis power and the bets keep getting wilder and wilder... until things go south... 


═════ ★ • ☾ • ★ ═════

The winner of Fumiko will receive an animated PFP through FND if the final bid is more than 0.5 ETH, otherwise, it will still be given through Polygon!
